title: Our Mission
paragraph1: Astrolith’s mission is to harness the power of Web3, through digital art, to raise awareness of the field of space resource utilization while celebrating black women in the space industry.

title: Our Purpose
paragraph1: Our purpose is to showcase how humans can use off-world solutions to solve Earth’s problems, from racial inequity to natural resource depletion.

title: Our Vision
paragraph1: Our vision is to inspire Earth’s future galactic pioneers and ambassadors from a planet worth saving.

title: Our Core Values
paragraph1: Women of color are grossly underrepresented in the space industry and, more broadly, in STEAM (science, technology, engineering, arts, and math) and Web3. Astrolith is dedicated to promoting gender and racial diversity in these areas.

title: Our Background
paragraph1: Astrolith is the brainchild of Lisa Haley and Taryn Haley Van Deusen, a mother-daughter team with backgrounds in the field of space resource utilization. With Taryn’s daughter as the design muse, Astrolith is the first NFT company with three generations of women on its team.
